caption.p: List of DENV inhibitors isolated by targeting host process. LLC-MK2 = rhesus monkey kidney cell, BHK = baby hamster kidney, GAG = glycosaminoglycan, DC-SIGN = dendritic cell-specific intercellular adhesion molecule-3-grabbing non-integrin, MEK = MAPK/extracellular receptor kinase (ERK) kinase, NTRK1 = neurotrophic receptor tyrosine kinase 1, MAPKAPK = MAP kinase-activated protein kinase, RIG-I = retinoic-acid inducible gene I, IMP dehydrogenase = Inosine-5′-monophosphate dehydrogenase.

tr.td: Plant lectins from Hippeastrum hybrid, Galanthus nivalis, Urtica dioica
Extract from Uncaria tomenrosa, N. brasiliensis Choisy, Uncaria guianensis
